titleStmt.title: The historie of the troubles of Hungarie containing the pitifull losse and ruine of that kingdome, and the warres happened there, in that time, betweene the Christians and Turkes. By Mart. Fumée Lord of Genillé, Knight of the Kings order. Newly translated out of French into English, by R.C. Gentleman.
Histoire des troubles de Hongrie. English
titleStmt.author: Fumée, Martin, ca. 1540-ca. 1590.
Churche, Rooke.

notesStmt.note: A translation, by Rooke Churche, of: Histoire des troubles de Hongrie.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
